title: The Private Whisperer
itunes:title: The Private Whisperer
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I'm a 22 year old college student and I just started my senior year at a new school. I've joined a frat and met an awesome girl and it was all going great until last week. We threw a party to kick-off the semester and when my frat brothers saw my girlfriend they all got awkward and quiet. She didn’t stay long after that and when she left, I called them out for acting weird and ignoring my girl...........

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
